channel.title: Jason's appearance on the On RPGs podcast
channel.description:
I was recently a guest on the On RPGs podcast. Donald and I discuss Gauntlet Hangouts, playing ttrpgs online, and more! It's a really terrific conversation. Check it out!
http://onrpgs.libsyn.com/on-rpgs-067-run-the-gauntlet

item.title: Jason's appearance on the On RPGs podcast
item.dc:creator: @jasoncordova
item.description:
@jasoncordova wrote:

Donald is a really nice guy. He’s from OKC, so we have been able to hang out a bit.

Read full topic
item.source: Jason's appearance on the On RPGs podcast

item.title: Jason's appearance on the On RPGs podcast
item.dc:creator: @GroupSoliloquy
item.description:
@GroupSoliloquy wrote:

I enjoyed this a lot. Wasn’t much new information for myself, but I’m not really the target audience. I hope this brings more people to The Gauntlet, Donald certainly came across as someone I’d love to have around.

Read full topic
item.source: Jason's appearance on the On RPGs podcast
